com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations.widgets

Annotation Type Html5SmartImage


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
 @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Html5SmartImage
    Represents a Widget of type CQ.html5.form.SmartImage in Classic UI

    The Smart Image is not supported in Touch UI and will render as a granite/ui/components/foundation/form/fileupload Widget

    • Optional Element Summary

    • Element Detail

      • disableFlush

        public abstract boolean disableFlush
        Used for Classic UI only

        True to not render the flush button.

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • disableInfo

        public abstract boolean disableInfo
        Used for Classic UI only

        True to hide the "information" tool

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • disableZoom

        public abstract boolean disableZoom
        Used for Classic UI only

        True to not render the zoom slider

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • isSelf

        public abstract boolean isSelf
        Indicates that this component represents the image itself and as such the image properties and file assets should be stored on the component's resource instead of a child resource
        Default:
        false

      • uploadUrl

        public abstract String uploadUrl
        Path to which files will be uploaded.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "/tmp/upload/*"

      • ddGroups

        public abstract String[] ddGroups
        Used for Classic UI only

        Groups involved in drag & drop

        Returns:
        String[]
        Default:
        "media"

      • tab

        public abstract boolean tab
        Used for Classic UI only

        Indication of whether the HTML5 Smart Image Widget should be rendered as a stand alone tab.

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • height

        public abstract int height
        Used for Classic UI only

        Height of the SmartImage component. Note: You must explicitly specify height if you intend to render the HTML5 Smart Image Widget outside the context of its own tab.

        Returns:
        int
        Default:
        0

      • allowUpload

        public abstract boolean allowUpload
        Used for Classic UI only

        Flag if uploading a file is allowed

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • cropAspectRatios

        public abstract AspectRatio[] cropAspectRatios
        Used for Classic UI only

        Crop Config Aspect Ratios

        Returns:
        AspectRatio[]
        Default:
        {}

      • allowCrop

        public abstract boolean allowCrop
        Used for Classic UI only

        Method to turn on cropping and automatically set the cropParameter; this simplifies #cropParameter()

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • allowRotate

        public abstract boolean allowRotate
        Used for Classic UI only

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

        public abstract boolean allowMap

        Method to turn on mapping and automatically set the mapParameter; this simplifies #mapParameter()

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • multiple

        public abstract boolean multiple
        Used for Touch UI Only

        Indicates that multiple files may be uploaded

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • touchUIUploadUrl

        public abstract String touchUIUploadUrl
        Used for Touch UI Only

        URL where to upload the file, you can use ${suffix.path}. Upload semantics are different between the legacy ExtJS API and the new Touch UI API.

        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "${suffix.path}"

      • uploadUrlBuilder

        public abstract String uploadUrlBuilder
        Used for Touch UI Only

        The AEM documentation indicates that this should be an upload URL builder

        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • autoStart

        public abstract boolean autoStart
        Used for Touch UI Only

        If true, upload starts automatically once the file is selected

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • useHtml5

        public abstract boolean useHtml5
        Used for Touch UI Only

        Prefer HTML5 to upload files (if browser allows it)

        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • dropZone

        public abstract String dropZone
        Used for Touch UI Only

        Drop zone selector to upload files from file system directly (if browser allows it)

        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

        Returns:
        String
        Default:

        Returns:

        Default:

        Used for Touch UI Only
